column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////We ordered the bacon wrapped dates
column3: brussel sprout salad and seared sea scallops. The bacon wrapped dates tasted like they had a maple glaze on them and were absolutely delicious. The tenderloin and blue cheese melted in your mouth and was really rich and flavorful. The brussel sprout salad was alright
column4: nothing very exciting. I wouldn't reccomend that if you are considering it. The seared scallops were very good and sat on a bed of acorn squash puree.
